none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on January 11, 2023 Description from Terminal Escape:
 So I'm in Albuquerque, New Mexico a few weeks ago, digging for tapes in this record store. I grab a few I'm stoked about, a couple I'm curious about, and a $2 cassette that looked like it might have some weird religious chants or some shit. As the store owner is adding everything up, he picks up a copy of Results Oriented and says "Some guy brings these tapes in occasionally - plastic bags with little slips of paper inside. You interested?" And I replied, "Interested? Of course I am. Thank you." I settled up and thought as I was leaving "I feel at home here. They know me."RESULTED ORIENTED
https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEiGIJzRuCJBUVYdH2wVqHwQk9Dc4UbCTmqpvgz0OzDOS513OxSZRJoTz30Se0CmeQMnaNap5uuHulmZL22xjo0Y6H7GvhbZvdaeLdOGXKlmrspu9dVpb1y9OT3jeipFoZz1dsIrIG8C3N7HXzKpT01-yReW2cDYRHPPh97hPeiYEgoQ4wTOkwbhvAEq8Q/s537/Unlimited%20back%20copy.jpg https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEjPoxj1t0S7LIH6cTQ_EDM4DEWmgM0TMnjgldHibtJ8RJnPZERtMjd-ZRLJ9izzSnA4oS0_5jJ4EXpkyBbYgVyF9uQIJsSglmt1mpaeBDqvyVbM53P40riQ8F1SsSSuyLHbIm4dMkD72eZmAcf90QdElqQOtdWHWHs3llXsN_4zLr95DGPSUxy-RMnxbA/s1151/Unlimiteddd.jpg

seo.title: Unlimited Bandwidth - Results Oriented - Terminal Escape

 So I'm in Albuquerque, New Mexico a few weeks ago, digging for tapes in this record store. I grab a few I'm stoked about, a couple I'm curious about, and a $2 cassette that looked like it might have some weird religious chants or some shit. As the store owner is adding everything up, he picks up a copy of Results Oriented and says "Some guy brings these tapes in occasionally - plastic bags with little slips of paper inside. You interested?" And I replied, "Interested? Of course I am. Thank you." I settled up and thought as I was leaving "I feel at home here. They know me."RESULTED ORIENTED
